name: Bash Sports Online Bowling
description:
BASH Game Studio presents BASH Sports Online Bowling. BSO Bowling is the first of arcade style sports games in the BASH Sports Online Family.

Play solo and try to bowl a perfect game and join Club Sparta, or challenge up to eight of your friends online to compete for high score.

When you are brave enough jump into Bowling Royale Mode where it is a challenge for last man standing miss a strike and your out! Do you have what it takes to take the royale crown?

Features voice announcing, bowling alley feel and rockets? Everybody needs a little firepower now and then.

this game is ever expanding and new things to be added.

Do you have what it takes? We will see you online!
